oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of Parenteral Supply of Iron and Copper on Hematology, Performance, and Health in Neonatal Dairy Calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mohri, M.
Heidarpour, M.
Seifi, H. A.
Alavi, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: iron
RBC parameters
copper
iron deficiency
copper deficiency
calves
herd health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this present study was to examine the effects of parenteral administration of iron and copper on hematological parameters, growth, and health of dairy calves in the period when iron and copper deficiency could exist.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2007; 286
